column1: Smoque BBQ////Super delish! I ordered baby back ribs
column5: cornbread & French fries. Ribs very filling & quite the quality
column6: very YuMMi. Brisket sandwich was very good
column7: but a little fatty. mac'n cheese & baked beans are to die for & cornbread so delish with corn inside. I love this place & always try to swing by when in the area
column8: even the coleslaw is delish!! Only downfall is they are super busy(which is great)aNd if you are looking for a quick meal
column9: that probably won't happen here. The have time groups eVen for pick up. I never
column11: have waited longer than a 1/2 hour.
